FuncDef: This command configures the cli-user for the configuration coming from VSD (fully dynamic VSD integration model). The user-profile determines what CLI set of commands can be executed by the VSD. This set of commands is a sub-set of the white-list of commands allowed by the system for the or VSD. You can use thetools dump service vsd-services command-listto check the white-list of commands.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the user-name that the VSD will use when adding a configuration to the system.
